pkgmetadata.longdescription: Work with Refreshable Datasets that Update their Data Automatically // Connects dataframes/tables with a remote data source. Raw data downloaded from the data source can be further processed and transformed using data preparation code that is also baked into the dataframe/table. Refreshable dataframes can be shared easily (e.g. as R data files). Their users do not need to care about the inner workings of the data update mechanisms.
